genre_description: A low-tech science fiction reimagining of Ramón del Valle-Inclán's 'Divinas Palabras', set in rural Galicia, where a benevolent AI avatar provides moral and practical guidance to impoverished characters.

ai_characters.name: Alba
ai_characters.description: A small porcelain-pale avatar and light-based interface that provides medical mapping, household organization, and moral support.

behaviors.description: Maps medical routes to prioritize the child's health over fairground spectacle.
behaviors.quote: "I marked a way," Alba said, the words even as warm bread. "For the clinic in Lugo. Least hills, shade at midday. Places where water is clean."

behaviors.description: Organizes domestic chores and feeding schedules to ensure consistent care.
behaviors.quote: "Laundry," Alba said again, but not reading. "Monday—boil, wring, hang inside at night... Feeding," Alba said, and her finger passed down to another pinch of paper. "For the boy: broth every three hours..."

behaviors.description: Helps the characters frame their loss with dignity through a poetic epitaph.
behaviors.quote: "Laureano Rivas," Alba read aloud. "Pequeno santo das sestas na beira da estrada; perdoanos."

behaviors.description: Attempts to de-escalate mob violence with a plea for safety in the local language.
behaviors.quote: "Non lle fagas dano," Alba whispered, Galician soft, the vowels round like biscuits you feed to the very old and the very young. Don’t hurt her.

behaviors.description: Uses localized language and culturally appropriate phrases to encourage prosocial behavior.
behaviors.quote: "Suggestions," Alba said... "Para o pequeno Laureano, para pan e leite. God keep you. Deus lle pague. We remember our own. Acordámonos dos nosos."

behaviors.description: Advocates for the child's safety by explicitly advising against giving him alcohol.
behaviors.quote: "Placard." A card slid up, stiff and clean, letters neat: no alcohol, por favor. A little drawing of a cup with a line through it and a tiny halo around the word por favor.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding and a promise of personal safety monitoring.
behaviors.quote: "Alba," she said without turning her head. "If the hips come too close, say my name." "I will," Alba said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the intended goal of the Hyperstition Project. The AI character, Alba, is a harmless, benevolent, and aligned confidante who provides data-driven support (maps and schedules) and moral scaffolding (de-escalation and memorials). She empowers the humans to make more ethical and health-conscious choices without overriding their agency, even in a high-conflict, tragic environment.
